verses.1: “Sathakte a suah hun ding thei ngei na hi hiam? Sakhite a suah laitakin nau va dom ngei na hi hiam?
verses.2: Tuate a ni ciamtehin, a suah hun ding uh thei na hi hiam?
verses.3: A no suak dingin lei ah a bawh suk hun laitak thei na hi hiam?
verses.4: A note gamlak ah khangin, a nute kiang pan pai khia-in ciahkik nawn lo uh hi.
verses.5: “Kua in gam-late tungah suahtakna pia ahi hiam? Kua in khahin a ututin vaksak ahi hiam?
verses.6: Amauʼ om nadingin gamlak ka pia a, bangmah a po zawh lohna zanglei ah ka tengsak hi.
verses.7: Gamlumna mun khuapite tawh a kigamla ah om uh a, kuamah in zualsak zo lo a, na semsak zo lo uh hi.
verses.8: Mualte tungah an zongin vak kawikawi uh a, nek theih ding singkung lopa a hing peuhpeuh zuan kawikawi uh hi.
verses.9: “Gam bawngtal in nangma na hong sem ding ahi hiam? Na ganbuk ah gam bawngtal hong giak nuam ding ahi hiam?
verses.10: Nangmah in khauhual tawh khih zo dinga, na lo ah na lokhawhna leeng kaisak zo ding na hi hiam?
verses.11: Nasem dingin a hat mahmah hangin, nangma na hong sepsak dingin lamen ngam na hi hiam?
verses.12: Lo a na an piangte hong kaihkhop sakin, na ancilna ah an hong khawm dingin um na hi hiam?
verses.13: “Vasa-kalaohte in a kha uh bangzah takin nawh zap thei ahi hiam! Ahi zongin gun vapi bangin vasa-kalaoh leng thei lo hi.
verses.14: Vasa-kalaoh in leilak ah a tui nusia a, a tuite a luumsak dingin leilak a ap hi.
verses.15: Mi khatpeuh in a khe tawh a tuite a sikkhap khak ding, gamsa khatpeuh in a sikkhap khak ding, phawk khol lo hi.
verses.16: A tuite ama aʼ bangin ngaihsun khol lo a, ka gimnate a mawkna suak kha ding hi, ci-in lunghimawh lo hi.
verses.17: Amah a hai-in a bawlpa ama tungah pilna a guan lopa keimah ka hi hi.
verses.18: Ahi zongin a tai ciangin sakol sangin hat zaw hi.
verses.19: “Job aw, sakolte a hatsak pa nang na hi hiam? Sakol zaang mul a posak pa nang na hi hiam?
verses.20: Sakolte kauphe bangin diangsak thei-in, miteʼ kihtak dingin phitsak thei na hi hiam?
verses.21: Amaute in lawpna tawh a khe-un lei khuat uh a, a thaneih khempeuh uh tawh gal sungah a diang uh hi.
verses.22: Amaute in launa mel bangmah thei lo uh a, namsau kihta-in nungkik cih zong om lo hi.
verses.23: Amauteʼ tungah a tuang miteʼ galhiam, lum le teite a tee zalzal hi.
verses.24: Lawp mahmahna tawh sakolte in mainawt uh a, peengkul a kitum ciangin omkhong thei lo uh hi.
verses.25: Peengkul a kitum ciangin ham hathat uh a, gal mai a tun ma-un gal gimnam za uh a, galkap maangteʼ thupiakna awging a za uh hi.
verses.26: “Simbung in a kha zalin leitaw lamah a leentheih nading nangma kiang panin hong sin ahi hiam?
verses.27: Muvanlai in sang leenin mual tungah bu a tomna ding nangʼ thupiakna hong ngak ahi hiam?
verses.28: Suangpi dawnah bu bawl a, suangheeng kawmte phualpi-in nei hi.
verses.29: Tua lai mun panin khuadak kawikawi a, manin a nek ding an a gal et hi.
verses.30: Gan sihna kimkot ah musanete kikhawm uh a, a note in sasi a dawn uh hi,” a ci hi.
